block.p: BENNET-Lillian. On October 12, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Charles. Devoted mother of Philip Bennet and Carol Schoenberg. Also survived by five grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. Service Friday, 10:30 AM, at Park Avenue Synagogue, 87th Street at Madison Avenue, New York.

BENNET-Lillian. The Officers, Trustees, Clergy and Members of Park Avenue Synagogue mourn the passing of a devoted congregant. We extend to the entire family our heartfelt sympathy. David H. Lincoln, Senior Rabbi Geoffrey J. Colvin, Ch. of the Bd. Paul S. Schreiber, President
